Danbury.Brookfield Library:
The Brookfield Library is the public library serving the Town of Brookfield, Connecticut. In 2015, over 95,000 patrons visited the library, with over 143,000 items checked out and over 10,000 patrons participating in library programs.


== History ==
The Brookfield Library was constructed in 1922, and was the first library in the Town of Brookfield.
